Reviews.Title: $600 phone for $50
Reviews.Author: Kimberly S. Davenport
Reviews.Content: If anyone travels internationally or needs dual numbers for business, like I do, this dual sim worldphone is a godsend. This phone offers everything one of the expensive smartphones do, but at a fraction of the cost. A phone, media player, and ereader, all in one, for less than you would pay for any of those machines individually. Same idea as one of the i9 sciphones, but this one actually works. Great Buy!

Reviews.Title: SVP M1 Cell Phone
Reviews.Author: deathstar300
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone.and I am sorry I bought it. You cannot capitalize the name in your phone book. The key board for texting is the numeric key board not the qwerty. It is just a basic touch phone. It doesnt even have a calculator. Its too basic to be a touch screen phone.

Reviews.Title: enjoying the phone
Reviews.Author: jaiye
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying this product after initial hiccups that lead me to ask for returns.The volume of ring tones and alert tones are quite high and may be unsuitable for office environment
